detail_desc: Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, pleats at the top and tapered legs with creases. A zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets and fake welt back pockets. The polyester content of the trousers is partly recycled.

Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, pleats at the top and tapered legs with creases. A zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets and fake welt back pockets. The polyester content of the trousers is partly recycled.

Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, pleats at the top and tapered legs with creases. A zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fasteners, side pockets and fake welt back pockets. The polyester content of the trousers is partly recycled.

Straight-cut dress in a cotton poplin weave with a round neckline and flounce-trimmed, V-shaped seam at the top. Opening and button at the back of the neck, and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication and a small frill trim. Unlined.

Straight-cut dress in a cotton poplin weave with a round neckline and flounce-trimmed, V-shaped seam at the top. Opening and button at the back of the neck, and short puff sleeves with narrow elastication and a small frill trim. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with a round neckline and a small opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short sleeves with a flounce over each shoulder and covered elastication at the hems. Gathered seams on the skirt for added width. Unlined.

Long zip-through hoodie in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with a lined, drawstring hood, zip down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with quilted sections and wide elastication at the cuffs.
Puffer jacket in nylon with a detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Narrow, elasticated trim around the hood, cuffs and hem. Lined.

Studio Collection. Long hoodie in patterned cotton sweatshirt fabric. Lined hood with a contrasting colour drawstring, dropped shoulders, wide sleeves and contrasting colour ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.
Sleeveless, wrapover body in jersey with a deep V-neck front and back. Relaxed fit at the top with gathers and wide shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and a gusset with press-studs.
Sleeveless, wrapover body in jersey with a deep V-neck front and back. Relaxed fit at the top with gathers and wide shoulder straps, a seam at the waist and a gusset with press-studs.

Blouse in a textured weave with a slight sheen. Concealed buttons at the top and a small stand-up collar with a frill that continues down the button band. Double-layered yoke with a gathered seam at the back and long, voluminous sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs.
Leggings in jersey made from a cotton blend. Regular waist with covered elastication. The cotton content of the leggings is organic.
Wide leather waist belt with a large metal buckle. Width 4 cm.
Oversized sports hoodie in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Double-layered hood with an elastic drawstring, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Oversized sports hoodie in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Double-layered hood with an elastic drawstring, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
3/4-length leggings in cotton jersey with a wide waist panel.
Waist bag in grained imitation leather. Flap with a concealed magnetic fastener and an adjustable metal chain at the waist. Lined.
Cropped sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with an integral, lined sports bra that has an elasticated hem. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. High waist with a wrapover waistband. The polyester content of the tights is recycled.
Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. High waist with a wrapover waistband. The polyester content of the tights is recycled.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Long-sleeved hoodie in lightweight sweatshirt fabric made from a soft, denim-look cotton blend. Wrapover hood, ribbed kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless top in seersucker with frill-trimmed smocking at the top and narrow shoulder straps with a bow.
Sleeveless top in seersucker with frill-trimmed smocking at the top and narrow shoulder straps with a bow.
Sleeveless top in seersucker with frill-trimmed smocking at the top and narrow shoulder straps with a bow.

Tunic in soft Tencel™ lyocell twill with a collar, concealed buttons at the top, open chest pockets and a yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Dress in soft, patterned cotton corduroy with a seam with decorative gathers at the front and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs, and a seam and wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Glasses with metal frames and clear lenses.
Leotard in patterned, glossy jersey with decorative gathers at the top, crossover straps at the back and 3/4-length sleeves.
Knee-length dress in jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and a detachable tie belt under the bust. Unlined.
Fitted, knee-length dress in soft jersey with a round neckline and long sleeves. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.

Fitted, long-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Ribbing around the neckline, thumbholes at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. The polyester content of the top is recycled.
Boots in imitation leather with sturdy shafts and a loop at the sides. Satin linings made from recycled polyester and imitation leather insoles. Chunky soles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Long T-shirt in cotton jersey. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Long T-shirt in cotton jersey. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
V-neck jumper knitted in a blend of wool and soft, recycled cashmere. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
V-neck jumper knitted in a blend of wool and soft, recycled cashmere. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.

Shirt in sturdy cotton twill with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with a sleeve placket and buttoned cuffs, and a straight-cut hem.

Shirt in sturdy cotton twill with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with a sleeve placket and buttoned cuffs, and a straight-cut hem.

Shirt in sturdy cotton twill with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with a sleeve placket and buttoned cuffs, and a straight-cut hem.

Shirt jacket in cotton corduroy with a matching belt. Collar, dropped shoulders, press-studs down the front and at the cuffs, and a seam on the shoulders. Flap chest pockets with a press-stud, diagonal welt pockets and a soft belt with metal D-rings.
Classic T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a rib-trimmed neckline and an interactive motif.
Mesh trainers with imitation leather details, lacing at the front and a padded edge and tongue. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky, patterned soles.
Set with a cotton jersey top and tulle skirt. Top with a print motif on the front and long sleeves. Lined skirt with concealed elastication and gathers at the waist.
Top in cotton seersucker. Narrow cut at the top with a small opening and button at the back of the neck relaxing into an A-line style with a wide, flounced peplum.

Lightly padded, quilted jacket in a woven cotton blend with a ribbed collar and zip down the front. Straight cut with welt side pockets and long raglan sleeves with inner ribbing at the cuffs. Rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Lining and padding in recycled polyester.

Lightly padded, quilted jacket in a woven cotton blend with a ribbed collar and zip down the front. Straight cut with welt side pockets and long raglan sleeves with inner ribbing at the cuffs. Rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Lining and padding in recycled polyester.

Lightly padded, quilted jacket in a woven cotton blend with a ribbed collar and zip down the front. Straight cut with welt side pockets and long raglan sleeves with inner ribbing at the cuffs. Rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back. Lining and padding in recycled polyester.
Double-layered tube scarf in soft cotton jersey.
Double-layered tube scarf in soft cotton jersey.
Short dress in imitation leather with a collar, covered press-studs down the front, a chest pocket, short sleeves and a detachable tie belt. Lined.
Short dress in imitation leather with a collar, covered press-studs down the front, a chest pocket, short sleeves and a detachable tie belt. Lined.
Rib-necked T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey coloured with natural dyes.
Rib-necked T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey coloured with natural dyes.
Rib-necked T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey coloured with natural dyes.
Rib-necked T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey coloured with natural dyes.

Quilted, padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and side pockets. Narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lining and padding made from recycled polyester.

Quilted, padded jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, and side pockets. Narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lining and padding made from recycled polyester.

Windbreaker in woven fabric made from recycled polyester with a print motif on the front and reflective details. Detachable hood, a stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets and narrow elastication at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Body in mesh and lace with a push-up bra. Underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Lined gusset with concealed press-studs and cutaway coverage at the back.

Body in mesh and lace with a push-up bra. Underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Lined gusset with concealed press-studs and cutaway coverage at the back.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Ankle-length jeggings in soft, stretch denim with worn details. Extra-high waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Ankle-length jeggings in soft, stretch denim with worn details. Extra-high waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Ankle-length jeggings in soft, stretch denim with worn details. Extra-high waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.

Kangol x H&M. Oversized hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front. Lined hood, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a ribbed texture. High waist with wide, elasticated ribbing. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a ribbed texture. High waist with wide, elasticated ribbing. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Non-padded, underwired bras in lace with mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and extra-firm support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Calf-length boiler suit in soft viscose twill with a round neck, buttons to the waist, a yoke at the back and a small chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button. Seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist, patch front pockets and wide, gently tapered legs.
Cropped, short-sleeved sports top designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
